name: kubebox
description: Terminal and Web console for Kubernetes
author: Antonin Stefanutti

scripts.browserify: browserify -r events:events -r ./lib/config/context.js:context -r ./lib/http-then.js:http-then -r ./lib/kubebox.js:kubebox -r ./lib/task.js:task -r blessed -r chalk -r urijs -i clipboardy -u pty.js -u xterm-headless -u term.js -o docs/kubebox.js
scripts.browserify-debug: browserify --debug -r events:events -r ./lib/config/context.js:context -r ./lib/http-then.js:http-then -r ./lib/kubebox.js:kubebox -r ./lib/task.js:task -r blessed -r chalk -r urijs -i clipboardy -u pty.js -u xterm-headless -u term.js | exorcist docs/kubebox.js.map > docs/kubebox.js
scripts.executable-linux-x64: npm run bundle && export CXXFLAGS="-O3 -ffunction-sections -fdata-sections" && export LDFLAGS="-Wl,--gc-sections,--strip-all" && cd dist/js && nexe -b -i bundle.js -c=--fully-static -c=--without-intl -c=--without-npm -c=--without-dtrace -c=--without-inspector -c=--without-etw -m=-j$(getconf _NPROCESSORS_ONLN) -t x64-12.16.2 -o ../../kubebox -r "../usr/*" --verbose
scripts.executable-linux-arm: npm run bundle && export CXXFLAGS="-O3 -ffunction-sections -fdata-sections" && export LDFLAGS="-Wl,-latomic,--gc-sections,--strip-all" && cd dist/js && nexe -b -i bundle.js -c=--fully-static -c=--without-intl -c=--without-npm -c=--without-dtrace -c=--without-inspector -c=--without-etw --configure=--with-arm-float-abi=hard --configure=--with-arm-fpu=neon -m=-j$(getconf _NPROCESSORS_ONLN) -t arm-12.16.2 -o ../../kubebox -r "../usr/*" --verbose
scripts.executable-macos: npm run bundle && cd dist/js && nexe -i bundle.js -t macos-x64-12.16.2 -o ../../kubebox -r "../usr/*"
scripts.executable-windows: npm run bundle && cd dist/js && nexe -i bundle.js -t win-12.16.2 -o ../../kubebox -r "../usr/*"
